short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extremely simple extension for skipping YouTube ads: find the button and click it. Nothing the go wrong or break there.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extremely simple extension for skipping YouTube ads: find the button and click it. Nothing the go wrong or break there like it constantly happens with other YouTube ad skipping extensions. 

No concerns about your privacy - the whole script is a one-liner and limited to execute only on YouTube video pages.
